opportunities.name: Notion Database Sync MCP
opportunities.gap_summary: No dedicated Notion MCP server exists on Smithery. Existing Apify Notion scrapers are basic, don't handle large databases well. Users complain about rate limits and lack of bidirectional sync.
opportunities.differentiation_angle: Two-way sync with intelligent batching, progress tracking, handles 10k+ rows without timeout. MCP-native for Claude integration.

existing_solutions.name: Notion scrapers (Apify)
existing_solutions.weakness: Read-only, no sync, rate limit issues

opportunities.name: LinkedIn Profile Enrichment MCP
opportunities.gap_summary: No LinkedIn MCP on Smithery. Apify has scrapers but they're expensive, break frequently due to anti-bot, and aren't MCP-native.
opportunities.differentiation_angle: MCP server for Claude-native LinkedIn lookups with caching, rate limit handling, and enrichment from multiple sources.

opportunities.name: Airtable Advanced Sync MCP
opportunities.gap_summary: Smithery has basic Airtable MCP (588 uses) but users want more: formula support, linked record handling, attachment management, bulk operations.
opportunities.differentiation_angle: Enhanced Airtable MCP with formula evaluation, linked record resolution, attachment upload/download, and batch operations up to 10k records.

existing_solutions.name: Smithery Airtable
existing_solutions.weakness: Basic CRUD only, no formulas, no attachments

opportunities.name: Multi-Platform Social Scheduler MCP
opportunities.gap_summary: Individual platform MCPs exist (Instagram 103 uses, YouTube 30 uses) but no unified scheduler. Users want to post to multiple platforms from Claude.
opportunities.differentiation_angle: Single MCP to schedule/post to Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram, YouTube, TikTok with unified content adaptation per platform.

opportunities.name: Job Board Aggregator MCP
opportunities.gap_summary: Apify has Job Posting API but it's not MCP-native. No job aggregator MCP on Smithery for recruiters using Claude.
opportunities.differentiation_angle: MCP server aggregating Indeed, LinkedIn, Greenhouse, Lever job postings with filtering, deduplication, and application tracking.

opportunities.name: Google Workspace Super MCP
opportunities.gap_summary: Smithery has separate Gmail (965), Drive (132), Calendar (129), Sheets (11) MCPs. Users want unified workspace operations.
opportunities.differentiation_angle: Already exists as 'Google Super' (6 uses) but low adoption suggests UX issues. Opportunity to do it better with cross-service workflows.

opportunities.name: E-commerce Product Monitor MCP
opportunities.gap_summary: Apify has e-commerce scrapers but no MCP for Claude-native price monitoring, stock alerts, competitor tracking.
opportunities.differentiation_angle: MCP server for monitoring Amazon, eBay, Shopify prices with alerts, price history, and restock notifications.

opportunities.name: Research Paper Assistant MCP
opportunities.gap_summary: No academic research MCP. Users want to search arXiv, Semantic Scholar, Google Scholar from Claude and get structured paper data.
opportunities.differentiation_angle: MCP for academic research: search papers, extract citations, get PDFs, summarize findings, track citations.

opportunities.name: CRM Sync MCP (HubSpot/Salesforce)
opportunities.gap_summary: No HubSpot or Salesforce MCP on Smithery. Only Attio (58 uses) for CRM. Huge market for enterprise CRM integration.
opportunities.differentiation_angle: MCP for HubSpot/Salesforce with contact lookup, deal updates, activity logging, pipeline queries.

opportunities.name: Website Content Crawler Enhanced
opportunities.gap_summary: Apify's Website Content Crawler is free with 4.45 rating, 21M runs. Room for premium version with better JS rendering, structured extraction, and RAG-optimized output.
opportunities.differentiation_angle: Premium crawler with dynamic JS rendering, schema.org extraction, chunking for RAG, and citation-ready output.
